derivation: a primitive root; to be (physically) right (i.e. firm); but used only as denominative from H3225 (יָמִין) and transitive,
outline: 1. (Hiphil) to choose the right, go to the right, use the right hand, be right handed
kjv_def: go (turn) to (on, use) the right hand.
strongs_def: to be right-handed or take the right-hand side
